creator_2: Popo Iskandar (1927) Srihadi Sudarsono (1932) G. Sidharta Soegijo But Mochtar (1930-1993) Abdul Djalil Pirous (1933) Ahmad Sadali (1924-1987) Mochtar Apin (1923-1994)  Kaboel Soeadi  Affendy Jusuf  Setjadipradja Angkama  Zaini
physical_appearance: This print is composed of curvilinear forms overlapping rectangular shapes. On the top right is a circular form.
sgcool_label_text: Published in 1967, Liberte/ Merdeka is a folio of prints produced by artists associated with the Bandung Technological Institute (ITB). This interesting set of prints was essentially the artists’ interpretation of noted Surrealist poet, Paul Eluard’s poem Liberte. Consisting of the ‘who’s who’ of the ‘Bandung School’ of artists, this folio of prints can be seen both as an experimental publication in terms of the art-literary collaboration, and also the promotion of the print-making medium within the Indonesian context.
creator_1: Iskandar, Popo Soedarsono, Srihadi, 1931- Sidharta, G. (Gregorius), 1932- Pirous, A. D. (Abdul Djalil), 1932-  Sadali, Ahmad, 1924-1987 Apin, Mochtar Suadi, Kaboel, 1935- Zaini
